info.name: Craftelle API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Craftelle backend.

Base URL variable `{{baseUrl}}` defaults to `http://localhost:9090/api/v1`.
Change it to `https://neurosense-palsy.fly.dev/api/v1` for production.

body.raw:
{
  "facilityName": "Craftelle Workshop",
  "image": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
  "email": "facility@example.com",
  "phoneNumber": "+233241000000",
  "location": {
    "address": "123 Main St",
    "city": "Accra",
    "region": "Greater Accra"
  },
  "description": "A craft workshop",
  "website": "https://example.com",
  "establishedYear": 2020
}

{
  "patient_name": "Jane Patient",
  "drug_name": "Folic Acid",
  "dosage": "5mg",
  "route_of_administration": "Oral",
  "frequency": "Once daily",
  "duration": "30 days",
  "start_date": "2026-02-07",
  "end_date": "2026-03-09",
  "quantity": 30,
  "reason": "Supplement",
  "notes": "Take with food"
}

{
  "patientId": "patient123",
  "excessiveVomiting": false,
  "diarrhea": false,
  "historyHeavyMenstrualFlow": true,
  "infections": false,
  "chronicDisease": false,
  "familyHistory": true,
  "weight": 65,
  "height": 165,
  "age": 28,
  "shortInterpregnancyInterval": false,
  "multiplePregnancy": false,
  "poverty": false,
  "lackOfAccessHealthcare": false,
  "education": true
}
